actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to increase from 10 to 15 years the period during which veterans and certain wives and widows of veterans are eligible for educational assistance.

summary.text: Increases from ten to 15 years the period during which veterans and wives and widows of veterans are eligible for educational assistance. Extends from eight to 15 years the eligibility period for wives and widows to pursue a program of education by correspondence. (Amends 38 U.S.C. 1662, 1712)

titles.title: A bill to increase from 10 to 15 years the period during which veterans and certain wives and widows of veterans are eligible for educational assistance.
